email_body:
DEAR SIR, 

Re: Investment/Mutual Relationship

BASED ON THE INFROMATION AND RECOMMENADATION I GOT ABOUT QUICK GROWTH OF
BUSINESS INVESTMENT AND COMMERCE I GOT IN YOUR COUNTRY,I DEEMED IT NECESSARY
TO WRITE AND INFROM YOU ABOUT MY CONDITION HERE AND MY INEREST TO INVEST
IN ANY VIABLE VENTURE IN JOINT PARTNERSHIP WITH YOU.

Greetings Salaam Alaikum! FIRST MAY I HUMBLY INTRODUCE MYSELF,I AM MR, RASHID
KAHN THE COUSIN OF LATE PRESIDENT MOBUTU SESE SEKO WHO DIED A MYSTERIOUS
DEATH IN EXILE MOROCCO. 

WE GOT YOUR COMPANY PARTICULARS FROM A BUSINESS STUDY/COMMUNICATION LIBRARY
IN OUR COUNTRY AS A RESULT OF OUR NEED, WE FELT YOU MUST BE A GENUINE, WELL
ESTABLISHED, HONSET PERSON, WE CAN TRY TO RELY ON FOR AN ASSISTANCE TO INVEST
IN YOUR COMPANY/COUNTRY. 

BEFORE THE DEATH OF MY COUSIN, HE DEPSOITED THE TOTAL SUM OF US$15,000.000(FIFTEEN
MILLION UNITED STATE DOLLARS) CASH WITH A REPUTABEL SECURITY COMPANY IN
UNITED KINGDOM LONDON, GLOBAL FINANCE AND SECURITIES.   

SINCE THE DEATH OF MY COUSIN, ALL THE MEMBER OF MY FAMILY ARE STILL IN EXILE
IN WESTERN PART OF AFRICA WHER WE HAVE BEEN LIVING UNDER POLITICAL ASYLUM
FOR 4YEARS BECAUSE OF THE SANCTION IMPOSE TO OUR FAMILY BY THE NEW PRESIDENT
LAURENT KABILA THAT ALL MY COUSIN'S MONEY SHOULD BE RETURN HOME. 

SEEING THIS AS A VERY BIG PROBLEM I AND HIS WIFE MRS. FUNMI MBOUTU SESE
SEKO DECIDED TO CONTACT YOU DIRECTLY FOR AN ASSISTANCE BECUASE WE DO NOT
TRUST ANY BODY IN AFRICA. 

ARRANGEMENTS HAVE BEEN CONCLUDED WITH THE FINANCE COMPANY IN LONDON TO MOVE
THE MONEY TO YOUR COUNTYR IMMEDIATELY YOU INDICATE YOUR INTEREST TO RECEIVE
AND KEEP THE MONEY IN YOUR BANK ACCOUNT, OUR LAWYER WILL SEND ALL THE NECESSARY
DOCUMENT TO YOU AND THE FINANCE COMPANY TELEPHONE NUMBER, ADDRESS,SO THAT
YOU WILL ESTABLISH COMMUNICATION WITH THE FINANCE COMPANY IN LONDON. 

EVERYTHING WILL BE CONCLUDED WITHIN 7 WORKING DAYS IF YOU COMPLY WITH OUR
DIRECTIVES AND ADVISE ACCORDINGLY.AS SOON AS WE CONCLUDE ALL ARRANGEMENT
WE WILL SEND OUR LAWYER TO COME OVER AND MEET YOU FOR THE SHARING,YOU WILL
BE GIVEN 30% OF THE TOTAL SUM,WHILE 70% WILL BE FOR US FOR INVESTMENT PURPOSE
IN YOUR COMPANY/COUNTRY. 

YOUR ARE REQUIRED TO KEEP THIS BUSINESS CONFIDENTIAL, KINDLY GIVE US YOUR
PRIVATE/HOME TELEPHONE AND FAX NUMBER. 

THANK YOU VERY MUCH. 
BEST REGARDS, 

MR.KAHN RASHID  
FOR THE FAMILY.


________________________________________
Metti il faccione di Shrek sul tuo cellulare! http://www.specialeshrek.canale5.com
